sections.heading: 504. Physician-patient privilege; professional counselor-client privilege; definitions; general rule of privilege; who may claim privilege; exceptions to the privilege
sections.text: (1) As used in this rule:(a) A patient is a person who consults or is examined or interviewed by a physician for purposes of diagnos
